choices: The Blue hallway: Pokemon predator wing.
The Yellow hallway: Pokemon prey wing.
The Green hallway: Digimon predator wing.
The Orange hallway: Digimon prey wing.
The Red hallway: Human prey wing.
1.content:
Hello, and welcome to my tale. If you prefer Pokemon or Digimon being dirty; this interactive is an excellent match for you. Comments and criticism are always appreciated.
============================================================================

An exciting new display has been established at the downtown museum; everyone's invited to the grand opening!

         The strange message came without forewarning, this morning, in their junk mail. The unexpected note arouses their interest. Dashing up the unsteady, oak stairs leading to their bedroom; they searched through their worn dresser with incredible speed and found a ragged collection of dusty, tattered threads. They throw them on at once and snag their keys from the nightstand.

         They dash out the entrance and hurry to their waiting car. They spring to the driver's seat, shift the vehicle into motion and drive through the bustling streets. A huge, disorganized crowd greets them, so they hurry to the queue's end. Hours go by, and their excitement continues to increase, as they stay in the shrinking queue of museum patrons.

         Getting to the beginning took more time than they imagined; they dart through the unlocked doors nearly upsetting a couple of younger patrons. Maneuvering through the boisterous, crowded halls, they come to their destination. The exhibition's comprised of various sections; they never envisioned its staggering size. They question what section to visit.

         They spy an elderly, shriveled man moving toward them; he wanders with a heavy limp and the support of a large staff. He sets a shaking hand upon their shoulders. They take note of his delicate health; he is at least 100 from their best estimate.

"You received the notice! Good, please explore any hallway you wish, and enjoy the latest display."

         Momentarily disregarding their manners; they turn back to the display's gate. They look here and there, but the stranger has disappeared from view. They shrug their shoulders in bewilderment and set out toward...
1.title: A trip you will never forget.

choices: The door leading to more Pokemon predator displays.
11.content:
They stand in a large and intricate hallway; the walls are sapphire, and magnificent stone doors loom before them. The display is brand new, but the doors show centuries of age; the doors radiate a peculiar cerulean glow, and they ponder which one to enter. Countless images of Pokemon eating everyone decorate the corridor. They spy a large sign ahead of them and take a closer look.

Hall of Pokemon predators.

         They are puzzled by the strange sign, but at least, know where they are. They remain cautious as they continue to explore the odd hallway, but their frightened of what may await them. The hallway is long and confusing; they begin to grow fatigued before stopping dead in their tracks. They hear a loud, booming voice fill the hall.

"Welcome to the Hall of Pokemon predators."

         The voice belongs to the same stranger they met earlier, but he is nowhere in sight. They shrug before pressing on and continue to grow nosey. They freeze for a moment and recall the stranger's words; they notice five doors ahead of them and must choose one before proceeding any further.

         Each door's marked with a different sign. Bulbasaur display, Charmander display, Squirtle display, and Pidgey display. There is a fifth door leading to other displays. They head toward...
11.title: Hall of Pokemon predators.

111.content:
They browse the five doors carefully before choosing one to enter. They are unable to recognize the strange glowing images. They move closer and inspect their chosen door. This one resembles a Pokemon with a small bulb on its back. They figure this door is interesting enough, so they enter without further hesitation.

         The door slams shut behind them, and locks itself tight. They pull on the handle as hard as they can, but it will not budge an inch. They walk into the room and find two more stone doors awaiting them.

         These doors have the same decayed appearance and the familiar cerulean glow. Strange images appear engraved upon the massive archways. They inch closer to them and get a better look. They freeze, and the stranger's familiar voice fills the hall.

"Welcome to the Bulbasaur display; please choose a form before continuing."

         This sounds like a recorded message for museum visitors; the recording is annoying, but they manage to ignore it. Their attention turns back towards the two stone doors.

         Each door features a different engraving; they study them closely. The images resemble the same Pokemon with the bulb on its back and two other strange forms. They are confused, but they cannot stay here any longer. They make a snap decision, and head for the door reading...
111.title: The Bulbasaur display.

1111.content: They are a quadruped, reptilian creature. They somewhat resemble a toad or a young dinosaur with a spotted blue-green hide. They have three white toes or claws, growing out of their four legs. Their eyes are a bright red. Their most notable feature is the onion-like bulb on their back. They have become Bulbasaur. They are...
1111.title: Becoming Bulbasaur.

11111.content: They stood in silence, and the details slowly flashed through their mind. They were definitely a male. However, they still felt like something important was missing. They thought and thought, but nothing was coming to them. A trainer! The long forgotten memory raced through their head but was still fuzzy. However, they could not shake off the idea of being a wild Pokemon. The memory became more clear with the passing of time. They...
11111.title: Regaining a memory.

111112.content: They had a trainer and were never a wild Pokemon. Their excitement grew as they remembered the missing pieces of their life. There was still one nagging detail left in their mind. What was the gender of their trainer? The simple question had them stumped, but the answer soon came to them. They could clearly remember their trainer's voice, and they were certainly...
111112.title: Not a wild Pokemon.

11112.content: There was no mistaking their identity; they were a female. She felt a brief wave of relief pass over her. Unfortunately, other details were not as clear in her mind. She paced back and forth and tried to fill in the missing information. She had a trainer but what were they like? Could she have no trainer, and be a wild Pokemon? A sudden flash of remembrance came to her. She...
11112.title: Feminine thoughts.

111122.content: She always had a trainer with her. She had never been a wild Pokemon. She could now remember almost every detail of her trainer with perfect clarity. There was still a question remaining unclear to her. Did she have a male or female trainer? Their face! She could never forget her trainer's face, and could even picture it in her mind. A smile crossed her face, and she remembered...
111122.title: Who was her trainer?

1112.content:
They ignore the first door, and enter the second. The door slams shut behind them, and locks itself tight. They pull on the handle as hard as they can, but it will not budge an inch. They walk into the room and find two more stone doors awaiting them.

         These doors have the same decayed appearance and the familiar citrine glow. Strange images appear engraved upon the massive archways. They inch closer to them and get a better look. They freeze, and the stranger's familiar voice fills the hall.

"Please, choose either Ivysaur or Venusaur before continuing."

         This sounds like a recorded message for museum visitors; the recording is annoying, but they manage to ignore it. Their attention turns back towards the two stone doors.

         Each door features a different engraving; they study them closely. The images resemble some type of evolution. They are confused, but they cannot stay here any longer. They make a snap decision, and head for the door reading...
1112.title: Choosing between Ivysaur or Venusaur.

11121.content: After evolving from Bulbasaur they have grown small fangs, and have visible ear insides and pupils. Their skin is also a bit more blue. The most notable difference in Their appearance is that Their bulb has changed into a pink flower bud with leaves extending. This flower bud is heavy and makes Their back legs grow strong and sturdy to support it. They have become Ivysaur. They are...
11121.title: Becoming Ivysaur.

111211.content: They felt a sudden rush of strength and realised they were clearly a male. This fact soon faded, and another question entered his mind. Was he alone because he was a wild Pokemon? He could have a trainer, but who were they? He shook his head in frustration and tried to recall his trainer's features. The answer slowly formed in his brain. He...
111211.title: Feeling masculine.

1112112.content: Ivysaur had a trainer. Being a wild Pokemon never sounded right to him. He even remembered the day he evolved into an Ivysaur. He had to work hard to evolve, and he could never have done it without a certain someone at his side. He trained every day and even caused them many bouts of frustration. However, he never gave up, and his trainer was overjoyed at his evolution. They were...
1112112.title: Ivysaur has a trainer.

choices: She is alone. (She is a wild Pokemon.)
Someone is nearby. (She has a trainer.)
111212.content: There was a bright flash of light, and everything around them became blurry. The light lasted only a few seconds, and their vision slowly returned. The strange feelings running throughout their body were definitely feminine in nature. They must be a female. This new turn of events was shocking, but she had no other choice. She observed her new surroundings, and she noticed something important...
111212.title: She's a lady.

1112122.content: The most important detail was the person sitting on a nearby stump. The person did not look familiar, but she still knew they were her trainer. This small fact brought her some comfort, but what should she do? She drew closer to the figure, and could make out some of their features. She crept even closer, but her trainer did not move. Her trainer had fallen asleep. She could clearly tell they were...
1112122.title: Not alone.

11122.content: They are considerably larger and heavier than both of their pre-evolution's, and as such they move slower. They have retained their quadrupedal form. The bud on their back has bloomed into a large red flower. It has six expansive, white-spotted petals, supported on a brown trunk somewhat like that of a palm tree. Instead of patches on their skin; they seem to have frog-like warts. They have become Venusaur. They are...
11122.title: Becoming Venusaur.

choices: Goes exploring. (He is a wild Pokemon.)
Searches for the voice. (He has a trainer.)
111221.content: They did not remember much, after stepping through the odd door. they did feel one thing; they felt powerful. They looked over their new body, and everything became clear to them. They were a male. He pondered his new environment and wondered what to do. He thought he could almost hear someone's voice in the distance. He could also go exploring. He...
111221.title: A powerful feeling.

1112212.content: He was not mistaken; someone was definitely calling for him. He clumsily spun around, and could make out many tall buildings. He had no time to figure out the particular city or region; he was standing outside the local Pokemon center, and the voice was drawing closer. He ran as fast as he could manage; his awkward new form slowed his pace. He darted through throngs of people wandering the streets and turned a sharp corner. He slammed head first into the object of his search. His trainer was...
1112212.title: Searching for his trainer.

choices: A forest. (She is a wild Pokemon.)
111222.content: The feeling was strange; They felt a change taking place, but what was happening to them? They almost panicked, but the feeling subsided within seconds. They felt around their odd new body and realized they were now a female. Her next objective was to confirm her location. Nothing looked familiar to her. She eventually realized she was in...
111222.title: A sudden change.

1112221.content: She was inside a large, modern style house. All the furnishings appeared new, expensive, and spotless. She wandered from room to room but saw no signs of life. There were stairs leading to the upper level of the house, but her new form made climbing them a difficult maneuver. She almost gave up hope, but the front door suddenly opened wide. Her trainer stood in the doorway. They were...
1112221.title: A new home.

112.content:
They browse the five doors carefully before choosing one to enter. They are unable to recognize the strange glowing images. They move closer and inspect their chosen door. This one resembles a small lizard. They figure this door is interesting enough, so they enter without further hesitation.

         The door slams shut behind them, and locks itself tight. They pull on the handle as hard as they can, but it will not budge an inch. They walk into the room and find two more stone doors awaiting them.

         These doors have the same decayed appearance and the familiar cerulean glow. Strange images appear engraved upon the massive archways. They inch closer to them and get a better look. They freeze, and the stranger's familiar voice fills the hall.

"Welcome to the Charmander display; please choose a form before continuing."

         This sounds like a recorded message for museum visitors; the recording is annoying, but they manage to ignore it. Their attention turns back towards the two stone doors.

         Each door features a different engraving; they study them closely. The images resemble the same small lizard, and two other strange forms. They are confused, but they cannot stay here any longer. They make a snap decision, and head for the door reading...
112.title: The Charmander display.

choices: Teach him a lesson he will not forget!
Humiliate him in front of a crowd!
1121.content:
Charmander blinked and stretched himself; a bright and sunny day greeted him. His trainer lets him sleep outside his Pokeball; a change Charmander welcomed, and it started to remind him of his old life. He was just obtained from the town's Pokemon lab; Charmander's new trainer, Adam, is warm-hearted and enthusiastic. Charmander was loyal, and always followed his new trainer's orders without question. The pair soon became best friends.

         Some traits made Charmander unique and helped to set him apart from the others of his species. He was unusually smart and had managed to master the human language with little difficulty. Charmander is also considerably taller than the average of his species; he stood at 3'00", and weighed 22 pounds. Charmander's higher intelligence was quite handy when battling larger Pokemon.

         The good times soon faded; Adam soon became far more competitive with the other trainer's in his town and began to push Charmander much harder. He made Charmander fight in constant battles without rest and train continually no matter how bad the weather became. Adam always claimed it will make Charmander stronger, but he never thought training was worth the effort. Charmander was going to be in charge from now on and show his former friend what it is like to be mistreated!

         Adam is leaning against a nearby tree and is fast asleep; he was completely exhausted from his last battle and needed a good rest. Charmander took the opportunity to think of a plan; how will he take his revenge...
1121.title: Wanting to be in charge.

choices: Challenge Treecko to a friendly match.
11211.content:
Charmander red text.
nurse Joy: pink text.
Treecko: green text.
=======================================================

         Charmander decided to run away and live on his own. Charmander was once a wild Pokemon, so he should have no trouble. Charmander gathered up all the supplies he could carry and followed the map left in his former trainer's bags to the nearest city. He is tired when he first arrives, but Charmander wanted to explore his potential new home.

         There is a strange lack of humans in the city, but Charmander preferred it that way. Charmander walked around the city streets and managed to stumble upon a Pokemon center; the center is quite busy, and all sorts of Pokemon are happily wandering about the large lobby. Charmander headed for the front desk.

"Excuse me."

         Charmander politely remarked to the nurse Joy on duty. Charmander had originally thought all the humans were gone; it looks like a few may still be here. She turns around to greet him.

"Are you lost?"

         She inquires helpfully and looks delighted to see the small fire type. Charmander took some offense to her question; he tried his best to stay friendly, so he did not scare her off before getting some answers about his new home.

"I am not lost; I came here on my own."

         She nearly fell out of her chair upon hearing the fire type speak. Charmander assumes he is the first talking Pokemon she has seen. Maybe Charmander should have taken a different approach. Nurse Joy looks Charmander over in amazement.

"You can understand human language?"

"Why of course I can! What can you do for entertainment around here?"

         Charmander tried to keep up his friendly demeanor. Nurse Joy takes a couple of minutes to recover from the earlier shock. She finally regains her composure and answers the question.

"I am new here and do not know much about the city; I just help to run the Pokemon center, but you could look around if you like."

         Nurse Joy replies honestly. She may not have been the best help, but Charmander did not hold it against her. Charmander decided to take her advice; he did not know what else he would find in the city, but it was better than staying here.

         Nurse Joy quickly turns around and continues her work. Charmander wandered through the streets, and soon arrived at the local city gym; he headed inside to explore. Many Pokemon are busy training, or just sitting around and relaxing. A Treecko is laying in a folding chair; he does not notice Charmander, so he tries to get his attention.

"Can you tell me anything helpful about this city?"

         Charmander hopes Treecko may have some answers. Treecko has his eyes tightly closed and looks as if he is fast asleep. Treecko evidently heard him because he slowly turns over in the chair and looks up at the fire type.

"Almost all the humans left this city long ago. No one here remembers much else about its history."

"So the Pokemon..."

         Treecko is taking his sweet time; he is not in any hurry to answer Charmander's questions. He has all the time he needs, so Charmander pulls up another chair and sits next to Treecko.

"The Pokemon run almost the entire city by themselves. They were all abandoned by their trainers or never had one at all. Feel free to stay here, and do whatever you like."

         Treecko stands up before stretching himself awake and starting to walk around the gym. Charmander thinks it over and decides it would be a good idea to stay here. Charmander just has to decide what to do first...
11211.title: On your own, and in a strange city.

112111.content:
"How about having a friendly sparing match?"

         Charmander thinks it over; he had not been on his own for a while. That fact should not matter, so he decided to accept the challenge. At least it will give both of them something interesting to do.

"Sure why not."

         They both go over to the battlefield and take their places. A Hitmonchan sees the two sparring, so he volunteers to referee the match. Charmander attacks first with a flamethrower, but Treecko easily dodges. He turned to attack again but noticed Treecko is already standing in front of him. Charmander is stunned by Treecko's amazing speed. Charmander is hit with a bullet seed before he can react; he is sent flying across the field, and nearly knocked unconscious.

"I give up."

         He thought not having a trainer around would be a lot of fun, but Charmander never envisioned things going like this. Charmander did not have long to think about his defeat before Treecko states the obvious.

"You need more practice."

         Treecko glances away; he was clearly disappointed with the outcome. Treecko helps Charmander to his feet. He started to remember why he trained every day. Maybe his trainer was right. He always said Charmander needed to get stronger.

"I may have overdone it a bit."

         Treecko turns and smiles at Charmander. They find a place to rest and talk for a while; they end up learning a lot about each other in a short time. Charmander explained how he used to have a trainer, but decided to run away.

"It was the same for me. I never could seem to please him."

         Charmander eventually confesses how he would sometimes pull pranks on his trainer. Treecko shakes his head. He sighs a little before continuing the conversation.

"Wish I had thought of that."

         After talking a bit more; they knew almost everything about each other. They even learned each other's darkest secrets. Treecko is the perfect match for Charmander, or so it seemed.

"I did not know we had so much in common!"

         The thought actually starts to scare him. Maybe Treecko is a little too perfect. Charmander brushes off the thought and immediately jumps straight back to the subject.

"Me either."

"Let's go and have a little fun? It is getting boring around here anyway."

         He had to admit Treecko is right. Since they are now such good friends; Charmander did not want to risk disappointing Treecko. He notices Treecko is watching him, and quickly replies.

"Sounds great."

         They both head out of the gym, and back into the crowded city streets. They talk a bit as they walk along. Treecko stops Charmander; he seems to have found an interesting place up ahead...
112111.title: A challenge, a quick loss, and a new friend.

1121111.content:
Adam: black text.
Treecko: green text.
Swellow: teal text.
Totodile: blue text.
==========================================================

         Treecko had noticed a hotel in the distance. They figure this is a good place to stay for a while, and head inside. The hotel is not very big, but it is surprisingly busy. They make their way through the large crowd, and head to the front desk, so they can check in.

"Can we get a room please?"

         Treecko queries of the large Golduck behind the counter. He turns around and hands Charmander a set of keys. Golduck immediately turns back to the crowd of waiting Pokemon. Charmander gives one of the keys to Treecko.

         They go up to their room on the 3rd floor. It is a large room and has everything they could need or want. Charmander would not have guessed the rooms were this big from the outside view. Treecko sits down on the soft bed.

"We could stay here and have some fun in private, or we could go visit some other Pokemon. I think we should go, and meet some of the other guests."

         Charmander finishes exploring the room and joins Treecko on the bed. Charmander flipped through all of the channels on the television but found absolutely nothing worth watching. They ultimately decide Treecko's idea is best.

         They make sure they have everything before leaving the room. They could go next door, or they could head downstairs. Where will they head off to first...
1121111.title: Staying at the Pokemon hotel.

11211111.content:
They walk next door, and knock politely. They did not want to barge in; that would be rude, and possibly embarrassing as well. A voice answers after a couple of minutes have passed.

"Come on in!"

         They see a Totodile and a Swellow sitting on the bed. The two are watching television, but they look quite bored. Charmander shuts and locks the door. Swellow is the first to notice them.

"Looks like we have guests."

         Charmander looks at Treecko, but he remains silent. Since Treecko does not want to introduce both of them; Charmander will have to do it himself. Totodile has not noticed either of them; he is currently too distracted by the flickering television.

"Hello. I was wondering if you are interested in joining us, for a little fooling around next door."

         Charmander came out with it and waited to see what the pair thought of his offer. Totodile turns around and looks a bit confused. Charmander decided to go into detail about meeting Treecko, and what they had talked about earlier.

"We never thought we would meet anyone who shared our interests! You know we could use this room, and make things easier for everyone."

         Totodile sure is talkative since they focused their attention on the new pair of guests; instead of the television. The trio agrees to stay here would be for the best. Swellow, who has been quiet this whole time, finally adds his thoughts to the conversation.

"I am willing to try anything! There is so much we could do, but how should we start?"

         Swellow sure is eager to get started right away. Charmander is unsure if they should move this fast; he just met the pair of Pokemon and is still a little nervous about group play.

"I am up for whatever everyone else wants to try."

         Totodile seems to want to get started with things as soon as possible. This just puts more pressure on Charmander. Treecko finally decides to add his thoughts on the matter.

"It does not matter to me, but I will do whatever Charmander suggests."

         He did not expect everyone would leave it up to him. With everyone looking on, Charmander had to do something. He thought for a few minutes, and then he decided what to do.

"Why not..."
11211111.title: Meeting a pair of adventurous Pokemon.

1121112.content:
"Over here."

         Treecko calls to Charmander. He follows Treecko's distant voice; he is eager to see what Treecko has found. When he finds Treecko; he is standing in front of a large building. The sign reads Pokemon research facility. They are both curious, and decide to explore further.

         At first glance the building appears empty; a large control panel stands in the center of the room. Charmander inspects it; the panel has several buttons, and each one has a different label. Table 1, Table 2, Table 3. This makes no sense to Charmander; he only sees one table in the room. He could press one of the buttons, or try getting on the empty table. He decides to...
1121112.title: Experimenting with Pokemon.

choices: Charmander gets on the table; Treecko will be running the control panel.
Treecko will get on the table; Charmander will be running the control panel.
11211121.content:
"This table sure looks interesting."

         Only one of them can go; the other will have to work the controls. At first Charmander thought of volunteering, but then he remembers Treecko. Perhaps he will volunteer instead? Charmander would be far more comfortable using the control panel. He talks it over with Treecko, and they agree that...
11211121.title: Who will volunteer?

choices: Treecko presses a button; Charmander shrinks to half his height.
Treecko presses a button; Charmander suddenly feels hungry.
112111211.content:
"I will get on the table, and you work the controls."

         Treecko nods before taking his place; Charmander heads for the empty table and sits patiently. Treecko looks confused by the many buttons and levers. He gives Charmander a questioning look. He did not think Treecko would have so much trouble and said the first thing that come to his mind.

"Just try any of the buttons; it should not hurt anything."

         Charmander is not even sure the machine still works. Treecko shrugs and turns back to the panel. He presses one of the buttons; a small ray-like device descends from the ceiling and points itself in Charmander's direction. He thought about backing out, but his curiosity overwhelmed him.

"Try another button."
112111211.title: Giving in to curiosity.

choices: Treecko has other ideas in mind.
Treecko tries again; Charmander goes back to normal, or so it appears.
1121112111.content:
"I will try this one."

         Treecko presses the button closest to him. The device hums to life; a sudden blast of yellow energy heads right for Charmander. His brain tells him to move, but his body will not listen. It turns out he should have reconsidered. The beam hits him, and Charmander feels a strange sensation come over him.

         Everything appears to have gotten bigger, but then it finally hits him. Charmander had been shrunk. Judging by his new surroundings; he is about 1'06". What is he supposed to do in this small state? Treecko does not seem very worried over the unexpected change. Maybe Treecko could reverse the process.

"Try again, and maybe I will return to normal."
1121112111.title: A small problem...

choices: Charmander is fine as he is; Treecko wants to play.
11211121111.content:
"Not so fast; this could be entertaining."

         Treecko grins evilly as he approaches. This is not good; Charmander cannot fight Treecko like this. Treecko sets up the machine and stands in front of the device. The instant the ray makes contact; Treecko starts to grow. When Treecko is done growing; he is the same height as a Sceptile.

"Maybe I should make you a little smaller before we play."
11211121111.title: Treecko takes advantage of the situation.

choices: Treecko puts Charmander between his toes.
Treecko is going to sit on Charmander.
112111211111.content:
"You are still a little too big, but I can fix the problem."

         Treecko quickly readies the machine, and it powers up. Whatever this machine is; Treecko is quite skilled at its operation. It is almost as if Treecko has used it before, so maybe there is something he has not revealed? If he can get out of this; he will definitely have to ask Treecko to explain what he has been hiding. The machine finally does its thing, and Charmander is reduced to 9". Treecko quickly lifts him off the table.

"Now let's play."
112111211111.title: A little size adjustment.

choices: He started to grow to the size of a Charizard.
He can shrink himself at will.
11211121112.content:
Treecko quickly chooses another button; He presses it, and another beam shoots toward Charmander. The last beam was yellow; this beam radiates an eerie blue glow. The beam makes contact, and Charmander waits for the results to take effect. At first nothing appears to happen. Is he stuck like this?

         Luckily Charmander did not have to worry. He started to tingle and returned to his original height. He hopped down from the table and went to join Treecko. Charmander is glad he is back to normal. Being stuck like that was not something he enjoyed. They start to leave the lab, but Charmander discovers something strange...
11211121112.title: ...Has interesting side effects.

choices: Treecko wants to give it a try.
Treecko declines, and they leave the lab.
112111211121.content: They are about to leave the lab when Charmander feels strange. He started to become taller until he was as big as a Charizard. Charmander was already bigger than the average height for his species, so he ended standing about 6'07" This is a side effect Charmander could really enjoy. He thought of all the possibilities his new stature will bring him. He wanted to be in charge, so maybe this is his chance. Maybe Treecko would want to try the device? Charmander turned to Treecko...
112111211121.title: Charmander's growth spurt.

choices: Grown to the size of a Sceptile!
Accidentally shrunk to half his height.
1121112111211.content:
"Do not forget about me!"

         Treecko exclaims after seeing the remarkable results. Charmander guesses it could not hurt to let Treecko try out the ray. Charmander goes over to the controls and sets up the machine. Treecko takes his place and waits patiently. The machine hums to life and fires a beam of energy straight at Treecko. Charmander hopes he had set the machine to the correct setting. When the machine shuts itself off; he finds Treecko has...
1121112111211.title: Treecko cannot resist.

115212112.content:
Plusle: light red text.
human kid: black text.
Grovyle: Light green text.
=======================================================

"Man, we had a rough training day right Plusle? Why not bathe in the lake?"

         They spied the naive trainer approaching their location and waited for the perfect chance to strike. The Pokemon and trainer looked unaware, so making a meal out of both of them sounded perfect.

"Plusleee!"

         The Pokemon nodded excitedly. The trainer removed his clothes and left them in the camp. He jumped into the lake; his Pokemon jumping in after him.

"Brrr, it..it is freezing."

         They patiently watched the scene unfold before them. They cannot afford to miss this one golden opportunity they had been given. They waited till the unsuspecting pair passed, and they took their chance.

"You need not worry you will soon be warmer..."

         They jumped silently into the lake, so the resulting splash could not be heard. They moved silently under the water, and towards the unsuspecting kid who was soon to be their next unwilling meal.

"Hey Plusle, let's find out who can hold their breath the longest!"

         The Pokemon nodded to his trainer, and both submerged themselves under the water for 30 seconds. They both had their eyes closed, the moment they were under the water. It was the perfect moment to strike!

         They grabbed the Plusle by its head, opened their maw as big as they could, and swiftly devoured him. They closed their mouth cutting off the unfortunate Pokemon's escape route; their cheeks now round and full. The Pokemon discovered what was happening all too late.

         He started to struggle; his efforts only made small bulges in the larger Pokemon's cheeks, as they finally tilted their head upwards and swallow. The bulge travels into their red throat until it merged in their belly.

"Plusle? You win, you can come out now."

         The kid announces worriedly; he feels something grabbing him by his ankles and starting to pull him back under the water's surface. He lets out a last scream before descending into the water's depths.

"Ah! what the?! help!!! burrrhbbu."

         The cry for help was cut short as they pulled him under the water and stuffed his head into their maw. They force him down their throat and bolt towards the surface. They wanted to further enjoy their captured prey, but they could drown if they did not hurry.

choices: The door leading to more Digimon prey displays.
14.content:
They stand in a large and intricate hallway; the walls are coral, and magnificent stone doors loom before them. The display is brand new, but the doors show centuries of age; the doors radiate a peculiar tangerine glow, and they ponder which one to enter. Countless images of Digimon being hunted and eaten line the corridor. They spy a large sign ahead of them and take a closer look.

Hall of Digimon prey.

         They are puzzled by the strange sign, but at least know where they are. They remain cautious, as they continue to explore the odd hallway, but their frightened of what may await them. The hallway is long and confusing; they begin to grow fatigued. They stop dead in their tracks. They hear a loud, booming voice fill the hall.

"Welcome to the Hall of Digimon prey."

         The voice belongs to the same stranger they met earlier, but he is nowhere in sight. They shrug before pressing on and continue to grow nosey. They freeze for a moment and recall the stranger's words; they notice five doors ahead of them and must choose one before proceeding any further.

         Each door's marked with a different sign. Gomamon display, Gatomon display, Biyomon display, and Palmon display. The fifth door leads to other displays. They head toward...
14.title: Hall of Digimon prey.

141.content:
They browse the five doors carefully before choosing one to enter. They are unable to recognize the strange glowing images. They move closer and inspect their chosen door. This one resembles a small white seal. They figure this door is interesting enough, so they enter without further hesitation.

         The door slams shut behind them, and locks itself tight. They pull on the handle as hard as they can, but it will not budge an inch. They walk into the room and find two more stone doors awaiting them.

         These doors have the same decayed appearance and the familiar tangerine glow. Strange images appear engraved upon the massive archways. They inch closer to them and get a better look. They freeze, and the stranger's familiar voice fills the hall.

"Welcome to the Gomamon display; please choose a form before continuing."

         This sounds like a recorded message for museum visitors; the recording is annoying, but they manage to ignore it. Their attention turns back towards the two stone doors.

         Each door features a different engraving; they study them closely. The images resemble the same small white seal and two other strange forms. They are confused, but they cannot stay here any longer. They make a snap decision, and head for the door reading...
141.title: The Gomamon display.

1411.content:
Gabumon: blue text.
Gomamon: teal text.

=======================================================

"Where are you taking me?"

         The smaller Digimon complains once more, and begrudgingly kept walking the narrow path through the digital woods. Gabumon maintained his mysterious silence, and the seal Digimon's annoyance with the larger rookie grew stronger as time slowly passed. They had walked for a while, and his feet started to hurt. He wanted to rest, but Gabumon refused to stop for even a minute. Gomamon started to wish he never agreed to this strange trip.

"Nowhere in particular."

"Then why did you bring me here!"

"Well..."

         Gomamon is relieved and thinks he may get the answers he desperately wanted, but Gabumon's mood suddenly changed without warning. Gabumon pins Gomamon to the ground in one swift movement, and Gomamon can only stare back in complete and utter shock.

"What are you doing!"

         The small white Digimon protests, and he flails about with all his might. However, Gomamon has little success overpowering the larger yellow rookie. Gomamon becomes more frightened and continues trying to break free from Gabumon's grip. Gabumon pays no attention to the helpless Digimon as...
1411.title: Gomamon's unlucky day.

14112.content:
"I have always wanted to do this."

"Wanted to do what?"

         Gabumon sees Gomamon is scared and uses this as a golden opportunity. Gomamon watches helplessly; he continues to struggle and tries to free himself. Gabumon still keeps his shoulders pinned with little real effort. The reptile Digimon smirks with increased air of confidence.

"I will not digest you, so do not worry."

"What! You are going eat me!"

         Gomamon yells in shock, and somehow finds his second wind. He nearly manages to slip free of Gabumon's iron grasp, but Gabumon soon succeeds in draining the seal's surprising stamina. Gabumon now had plenty of time to plan his next move. Gomamon continued to struggle weakly. Gabumon...
14112.title: Gabumon's secret desire.

info.description:
If you like Digimon or Pokemon being dirty; this is the story for you. The story may contain any combination of the following things: scat, farting, watersports, vore, rimming, sex, etc. You do not like the above topics; I would venture no farther. 4. I have decided to give a small amount of gift points for story additions; anyone who adds a chapter to the story, please make it at least a paragraph.
